description: This file defines the 'NoteEditor' component for a LightningJS application, implementing a user interface for editing notes with save functionality, and managing state including note retrieving and subscription handling.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, including user interface elements, state management, and interaction with note services.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues a save operation to be executed after a 600ms delay, cancelling any previous pending save.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note state through the 'updateNote' service and manages the 'saving' indicator.
